name: JAM IN SPACE 2
description:
JAM IN SPACE 2 is HERE!


Time to JAM!

Hot Shot Basketball!!


Multiple game modes! Create your own team name and battle against 20 teams!

Game Day - Play against other teams!
Practice - Gain experience and shoot better in the game!
30 SECONDS LEFT - Pretend you have 30 Seconds left in a game and try to beat the clock!
QUICK GAME - How many points can you score in 1 minute?

Shoot 2 and 3 Point Shots until the timer runs out!

Gain experience and play against the 20 teams!

Complete objectives to gain experience and boost your level!



Gamecenter Enabled!! Multiple Leaderboards! Battle against others!

VERY RE-PLAYABLE! Fun!
